title: Lots of t206 HOFers to trade for P350 back HOFer
author: David R

posts.post_title: Lots of t206 HOFers to trade for P350 back HOFer
posts.post_content:
Looking for any of the following with a Piedmont 350 back in 2-5 grade:  

Cobb bat on
Evers Portrait
Lajoie Bat
Matty white cap
Young bare hand

I can buy or I have the following cards I can trade (would prefer a trade):

Young throw P150 SGC 40
Matty white cap P150 SGC 30
Bender Portrait SC 150 SGC 40
Flick SC 150 SGC 40
Waddell Portrait P150 SGC 30
Tinker portrait EPDG sgc 40
Magee portrait EPDG SGC 30
Chase pink EPDG SGC 40
Evers Portrait P150 PSA 4
Brown chicago shirt SC 460 42 overstrike SGC 50

would you sell any of these or are you only looking to trade?

Young throw P150 SGC 40
Matty white cap P150 SGC 30
Bender Portrait SC 150 SGC 40
Flick SC 150 SGC 40
Waddell Portrait P150 SGC 30
Tinker portrait EPDG sgc 40
Magee portrait EPDG SGC 30
Chase pink EPDG SGC 40
Evers Portrait P150 PSA 4
Brown chicago shirt SC 460 42 overstrike SGC 50
I would consider selling if I can first find the HOFers I need with a Piedmont 350 back and also a SC 350, 25 back.
